title: How do I adjust the font size of Notes?
answer:
On the Notes screen, open the options menu and touch Settings. Then, adjust the font size. 

[![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/40dd2_wdiah.png)](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/40dd2_wdiah.png)

There is no specific option for adjusting the font size of the Notes. You can set the font size under Settings > Display > Font size. The font size of messages and contacts is automatically adjusted accordingly.
